description:
Surface wind speed and direction extracted from Comprehensive Ocean-Atmosphere Data Set (COADS) two-degree mean monthly climatology. Monthly summaries are averaged over 2 degree grids and data over land removed. COADS data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA.
The BCLME (Benguela Current Large Marine Ecosystem) includes the countries Angola, Namibia and South Africa.
name: BCLME: Wind Speed and Direction
